channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 3rd Gen AMD EPYC™ Processors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 3rd Gen AMD EPYC™ Processors

item.title: CVE-2024-21978|2024-08-05T16:05:34.019Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Improper input validation in SEV-SNP could allow a malicious hypervisor to read or overwrite guest memory potentially leading to data leakage or data corruption.

item.title: CVE-2023-31355|2024-08-05T16:04:24.813Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Improper restriction of write operations in SNP firmware could allow a malicious hypervisor to overwrite a guest's UMC seed potentially allowing reading of memory from a decommissioned guest.

item.title: CVE-2024-21980|2024-08-05T16:06:36.216Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Improper restriction of write operations in SNP firmware could allow a malicious hypervisor to potentially overwrite a guest's memory or UMC seed resulting in loss of confidentiality and integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-20587|2024-08-02T09:05:36.265Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Improper Access Control in System Management Mode (SMM) may allow an attacker access to the SPI flash potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-20587|2024-02-13T19:32:33.392Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Improper Access Control in System Management Mode (SMM) may allow an attacker access to the SPI flash potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-31347|2024-02-13T19:18:51.045Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Due to a code bug in Secure_TSC, SEV firmware may allow an attacker with high privileges to cause a guest to observe an incorrect TSC when Secure TSC is enabled potentially resulting in a loss of guest integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-31346|2024-06-04T17:19:15.832Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Failure to initialize memory in SEV Firmware may allow a privileged attacker to access stale data from other guests.

item.title: CVE-2023-31347|2024-08-02T14:53:31.084Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Due to a code bug in Secure_TSC, SEV firmware may allow an attacker with high privileges to cause a guest to observe an incorrect TSC when Secure TSC is enabled potentially resulting in a loss of guest integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-31346|2024-08-02T14:53:30.943Z -- amd -- 3rd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Failure to initialize memory in SEV Firmware may allow a privileged attacker to access stale data from other guests.
